name: BIRDMANE
description:
THE POINT:

Pop the bubbles to free the birds. If you help them all get free, maybe they can help you understand more.

THE CONTROLS: First/Solo Player

Arrow Keys turn you left and right, and up and down.

A and D Rotate you.

S opens your Sails when held.

Second Player

Numpad 4, 5, 6, and 8 turn you left and right, and up and down.

J and L Rotate you

K opens your Sails when held.

THE PAST:

I started working on this game while cooped up inside my apartment in a Chicago winter. Now springtime is here, and I've moved to San Francisco, and we're all still cooped up inside. I made this game to give myself some relief from cabin fever, and I hope it can do the same for you.

THE FUTURE:

I'm actively working on this right now. Expect tweaks and new content every couple of days for as long as it's marked as In Development, probably another month or so.

Intended Upcoming Features (In no particular order):

  • Nicer Water
  • More Bubbles
  • Richer World
  • Land Animals
  • UI Updates
  • Optional Timer for competition
  • Better Performance

Music By incomptech
Quack Sounds Effects by Audiomicro
Grass Texture by DemolitionDan
Better Minimal WebGL Template by seansleblanc
Everything else by Walter Verburg
